title: Badminton fundamentals
brief_description: This films intorduces the novuice to the basic rules of the increasingly popular sport of badminton. Illustrates what is needed to play the game, from the court used to the racquets and shuttlecocks and suggested attire (for the 1950s). It also demonstrates the rules of the game, how to play; handgrips, the various strokes and stances and tips for playing better.
